title: Adobe Campaign ExperienceEvent - Profile Snapshot Profile Subscriptions
description: Adobe Campaign ExperienceEvent optional snapshot of Profile Subscriptions.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: A single message sent to a recipient.

xdm:profileSnapshot.title: Profile Snapshot
xdm:profileSnapshot.description: Profile Snapshot contains the recipient of the message. This property is primarily used to link the message to a Profile using the `IdentityMap` but it can also be used to freeze some properties of the profile at the time the message was sent.

xdm:subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
xdm:subscriptions.description: Subscriptions that this profile is entitled to including terminated, expired or exhausted subscriptions.
